contentrichtext.text: <!-- This article was auto-generated by [[User:Polbot]]. --> {{taxobox |image = Quercus cerrioides tronc.jpg |image_caption = trunks in winter |status = LR/cd |status_system = IUCN2.3 |regnum = [[Plant]]ae |unranked_divisio = [[Angiosperms]] |unranked_classis = [[Eudicots]] |unranked_ordo = [[Rosids]] |ordo = [[Fagales]] |familia = [[Fagaceae]] |genus = ''[[Quercus]]'' |sectio = ''[[List of Quercus species#Section Quercus|Quercus]]'' |species = '''''Q. cerrioides''''' |binomial = ''Quercus cerrioides'' |binomial_authority = [[Heinrich Moritz Willkomm|Willk.]] & Costa |}} '''''Quercus cerrioides''''' is an [[Oak]] species of [[plant]] in the [[Fagaceae]] family, and [[Quercus]] genus. The [[tree]] is [[Endemism|endemic]] to [[Spain]]. It is a Conservation dependent plant threatened by [[habitat loss]]. ==See also== {{Commonscat|Quercus cerrioides}} *[[Quercus afares]] *[[Mediterranean conifer and mixed forests]] ==References== * Vivero, J.L. ''et al.'' 1998. [http://www.iucnredlist.org/search/details.php/34726/all IUCN Red List of Threatened Species - ''Quercus cerrioides'']. *[http://www.iucnredlist.org 2006 IUCN Red List of all Threatened Species. (Downloaded on 23 August 2007).] [[Category:Quercus|cerrioides]] [[Category:Endemic flora of Spain]] [[Category:Trees of Spain]] [[Category:Flora of Spain]] [[Category:Conservation dependent plants]] {{-}} {{Fagales-stub}}
